Summary: Tasty cookie at a fair price
text:
This cookie package was featured at the local supermarket, so I picked up a pack for a road trip I was going on. I liked the fact the cookie was soft (probably the reason the cookie was individually wrapped), and the taste was almost as good as homemade.

Four solid stars for the Quaker Soft Baked Oatmeal Cookie. Just shop on price; if the price is good, you'll enjoy your treat.
